trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Winston-Salem
There was one other sighting in Winston-Salem on or around December 22nd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI had a little extra time today to experiment with some sky photos and captured a UFO in two separate frames within miliseconds. The three photos are in sequence from my front porch facing North. Unfortunately the second photo is blurred, but you can still see the object. As you can see by the third photo, the UFO is missing. I have no idea how high the object is. Most UFO activity seems to be in the afternoon after 2:00PM and before 5:00PM.
Summary: Second day of taking random pictures of the sky.
